name: Big Sword Hero
description:
A platform fighting game with 4-player local, a party game that guarantees the mix between fun and epic battles with tense disputes. Simple mechanics and with varied maps and modes, each dispute is always unique.

Features:

  • 10 Playable Heroes;



  • 5 map themes, accounting for 15 arenas in total;
  • 3 game modes.

How to play:


  • Take the sword and throw it at your opponents, just one hit is enough to defeat someone;
  • Use your shield to protect yourself and steal the sword for yourself;
  • You can also jump on the sword's head to steal it.

How to play Cursed sword mode:


  • A player is randomly selected to possess the cursed sword, this one has the ability to pull the sword to him if he is far away, he must get rid of it before time runs out;
  • The rest of the players must run away from him and avoid sword contact as much as possible;
  • When time runs out, the player with the sword is consumed and another player is chosen, until only one is left.

Game requires at least two players, at least one controller is required to play
